items.value: (%@king%) sent (%@envoy%) to (%@king%) asking (*_his/her_-2-*) to join (*_his/her_-0-*) planned attack against (%@kingdom%).
The invasion plan was cancelled because (%@king%) died.
The invasion plan was cancelled because (%@king%) was dethroned.
(%@king%) discovers this plot! (*_He/She_-0-*) informed (%@king%) about it causing (*_him/her_-1-*) to resent (%@king%).
(%@king%) put (*_his/her_-0-*) kingdom, (%@kingdom%), under militarization to prepare for (*_his/her_-0-*) war plan against (%@kingdom%).
